name: A Zombie Game (Rekmodus)
description:
This is a top-down shooter inspired by Call of Duty Zombies and Soul Knights. This is a prototype so a lot of stuff are placeholders, such as the sounds.

Controls:

WASD - Move

Mouse - Aim/Shoot

Space - Knife Attack

R - Reload

F - Interact

Tab - Check Score

P - Pause

8bit perk jingles from: 

g.ripper <== 

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCKGszaWGa5uW7M6nZA9Xc4w

8bit Easter Egg songs from:

Melody Master <== 

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCNOh7f4o8yUGHzRaCWX67fA

Other Stuff:

Because this is a prototype and there are plenty of bugs, the following information might make the experience better.

You can use the knife to pick up powerups and interact with things.

Crossbow first shot lags the game. Shoot it again to stop the lag.

The longer the zombies path to you, the laggier it gets. Open more doors to let the zombies have a shorter path.

Cheats/Dev stuff:

Numbers 1-8 equips you with a gun.

Use the "M" key to kill all the zombies and skip a round.

Use the "L" key to gain 10000 points.

There are other cheats but these are the main useful keys for playing this prototype.
